pageTitle: No service on the Northern line

title.title: No service on the Northern line

texts: London Underground has the following travel advice for passengers:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Passengers should avoid the Northern line and seek alternative Tube, bus and rail routes","LU tickets will be accepted on all alternative services","We are also providing a number of alternative bus services picking up at stations served only by the Northern line, particularly in North London. These take passengers to stations served by other Tube lines."]}
LU apologises to passengers for this disruption to service. We are working hard to return a service on the Northern line as soon as possible.
The following rail replacement bus services are available:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eService A\u003c/strong\u003e : Edgware - Burnt Oak - Colindale - Kingsbury","\u003cstrong\u003eService B\u003c/strong\u003e : Hendon Central - Brent Cross - Golders Green - Finchley Road","\u003cstrong\u003eService C\u003c/strong\u003e : Hampstead - Belsize Park - Chalk Farm - Camden Town - Warren Street","\u003cstrong\u003eService D\u003c/strong\u003e : High Barnet - Totteridge - Woodside Park - Arnos Grove","\u003cstrong\u003eService E\u003c/strong\u003e : West Finchley - Finchley Central - Bounds Green","\u003cstrong\u003eService F\u003c/strong\u003e : East Finchley - Highgate - Archway - Highbury \u0026 Islington","\u003cstrong\u003eService G\u003c/strong\u003e : South Wimbledon - Colliers Wood - Tooting Broadway - Wimbledon"]}
Stationsnot served by these rail replacement services are:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Tufnell Park","Kentish Town","Mornington Crescent","Warren Street to Kennington inclusive","King's Cross to Kennington inclusive","Oval to Tooting Bec inclusive","Morden"]}
Passengers at these stations are asked to use existing alternative routes.
Passengers affected by the disruptions may be eligible for a refund .

For 24-hour information on public transport in London, please call: 020 7222 1234.

TfL's Realtime pages display live travel information on London's public transport network: www.tfl.gov.uk/realtime
Journey Planner checks the transport network's status before providing results. The best available route is shown automatically: www.tfl.gov.uk/journeyplanner
Travel alerts via SMS and email can be set up at: www.tfl.gov.uk/alerts
